text.0: drink soma juice for mighty power and vigour drink strongest one that thou mayst smite down vṛtra.
text.1: drink thou invoked for strength and riches drink thou thy fill of meath and pour it down o indra.
text.2: drink of the foodful juice stirred into motion drink what thou choosest of the flowing soma.
text.3: giver of weal be joyful in thy spirit and turn thee hitherward to bless and prosper.
text.4: let heavenly soma gladden thee o indra let that effused among mankind delight thee.
text.5: rejoice in that whereby thou gavest freedom and that whereby thou conquerest thy foemen.
text.6: let indra come impetuous doubly mighty to the poured juice the bull with two bay coursers.
text.7: with juices pressed in milk with meath presented glut evermore thy bolt o foedestroyer.
text.8: dash down outffaming their sharp flaming weapons the strongholds of the men urged on by demons.
text.9: i give thee mighty one great strength and conquest go meet thy foes and rend them in the battle.
text.10: extend afar the votarys fame and glory as the firm archers strength drives off the foeman.
text.11: ranged on our side grown strong in might that conquers never defeated still increase thy body.
text.12: to thee have we presented this oblation accept it sovran ruler free from anger.
text.13: juice maghavan for thee is pressed and ripened eat indra drink of that which stirs to meet thee.
text.14: eat indra these oblations which approach thee be pleased with food made ready and with soma.
text.15: with entertainment we receive thee friendly effectual be the sacrificers wishes.
text.16: i send sweet speech to indra and to agni with hymns i speed it like a boat through waters.
text.17: even thus the gods seem moving round about me the fountains and bestowers of our riches.
